## Web3sdksNftMediaProps interface

The props for the [Web3sdksNftMedia](./react.web3sdksnftmedia.md) component.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Web3sdksNftMediaProps extends SharedMediaProps
```

**Extends:** [SharedMediaProps](./react.sharedmediaprops.md)
